thread.title: Manveer Gurjar, Nia Sharma, Jennifer Winget – Kushal Tandon – meet TV’s newsmakers this week!
thread.title_full: Manveer Gurjar, Nia Sharma, Jennifer Winget – Kushal Tandon – meet TV’s newsmakers this week!

author: Urmimala Banerjee
title: Manveer Gurjar, Nia Sharma, Jennifer Winget – Kushal Tandon – meet TV’s newsmakers this week!
text:
Here is what Karan Singh Grover’s ex-wife Jennifer Winget said on his wedding with Bipasha Basu! 
It was week of controversies in TV world. Bigg Boss 10 winner Manveer Gurjar found himself in a soup as his marriage video surface online. After a round of conspiracy theories, he finally admitted that he was hitched. TV bombshell Nia Sharma attracted haters with a hot video post which offended people for god knows what reason. Here is a detailed look… 
Manveer Gurjar The winner of Bigg Boss 10 got home to a hero’s welcome but controversy also awaited him. A video of him dressed as a groom did the rounds. It showed Manveer with a girl who was his bride. His mom denied the marriage but some relatives said he was indeed hitched. Manveer issued a statement saying he was not married but later stated that he was hitched but the relationship did not work out. Gaurav Chopra told bollywood life that he did mention he was married inside the house. (Also Read: Manveer Gurjar’s wedding conspiracy: Discrepancies in India’s favourite commoner’s statements) 
Nia Sharma The hot TV actress got shut shamed for posting a video clip from her upcoming music video. It had the actress in a pair of denims and top moving to the music beats. People found it offensive and launched an online assault calling her cheap and a slut. Nia who is used to making news for her bold outings on social media gave it back with a sharp message to her haters. (Also Read: Cheap, shameless and slut is what fans are calling Nia Sharma after she uploaded a sexy video on Instagram – view pics) 
Jennifer Winget – Kushal Tandon In what can be described as one of the hottest scenes in the history of Indian Television, Jennifer and Kushal let go of their inhibitions for Beyhadh. It had Maya tattooeing Arjun to the tunes of Rasiya. The haldi sequence was also quite hot. Jennifer and Kushal wore white and fans went into a tizzy as they inked each others names. 
Adaa Khan Naagin 2 actress is all set to be a part of Pardes Main Hai Mera Dil. She joins Arjun Bijlani and Drashti Dhami on the show. It is the role of a businesswoman and Adaa will have a glam outing with show. She has played positive roles before in some shows. 
Yash and Gouri Tonk The couple became parents for the second time to Mayrah. She is their second daughter. Mayrah is born 13 years after Pari, their first child. The couple are over the moon.
